task.title: Create and Attach an EBS Volume

keywords.indexterm: EBS Creating a VolumeAttaching a Volume

context.p: The following example shows how to create a 10 gigabyte EBS volume and attach it to a running instance called i-00000000 running in availability zone zone1.

step.cmd: Create a new EBS volume in the same availability zone as the running instance.
step.stepresult: The command displays the ID of the newly-created volume.

step.cmd: Attach the newly-created volume to the instance, specifying the local device name /dev/sdf.
step.stepresult: You've created a new EBS volume and attached it to a running instance. You can now access the EBS volume from your running instance.
